table_caption: Descriptive statistics of clinical data. The table shows mean values, standard deviations (sd), and two-tailed p-values from actigraphy measurements and questionnaires. The actigraphy data “Lying down”, “sleep duration”, and “sleep efficacy” refer to daily mean. Visual analogue scale (VAS) data for fatigue, depression, anxiety, and sleepiness were collected before MRI. ESS = Epworth sleepiness scale.
